Title: Summerween
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Zach Paez, Alex Hirsch, Michael Rianda
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Jeff Bennett
Plot: Dipper and Mabel are trick or treating on Summerween, when a monster named 'the Summerween trickster' shows up. Dipper tries to impress Wendy by not treating.
